issue.title: Add add_exports & add_opens attributes to java_import

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
This reduces the difference between `java_import` and other Java rules, like `java_library` and `java_binary`.

* Propagate `add_exports` and `add_opens` through `java_import`
* Add a `add_module_flags` helper to `java_info.bzl`
* Add tests

Fixes #19556.
